.auto-claude/specs/004-audit-and-consoli.description: Complete audit of 20 orphaned UI files. Key findings: App_Original.tsx and App_Loop.tsx are orphaned entry points that import all other orphaned components. The entire contextual/ and layout/loop/ directories are orphaned. Only 3 files in loop/ are orphaned (AppShell, Sidebar, TopBar) - the rest (InsightCard, WorkspaceCard, etc.) are actively used.

src/components/layout/.description: The layout/ directory is now empty after removing the orphaned loop/ subdirectory. May need cleanup if no other layout components are planned.

src/components/contextual/.description: Deleted entire orphaned contextual/ directory. It contained AppShellV2.tsx, SecondaryPanel.tsx, index.ts, and 6 panel components (AIAssistantPanel, CallDetailPanel, FilterToolPanel, InsightDetailPanel, InspectorPanel, WorkspaceDetailPanel). Only import was from the also-orphaned App_Original.tsx.
